learning_objectives.description: Enter values appropriately on a calculator.

subtopic.notes_and_examples:
e.g. know not to round values within a calculation and to only round the final answer.
e.g. enter 2 hours 30 minutes as 2.5 hours or 2Â° 30' 0".
e.g. in money 4.8 means $4.80; in time 3.25 means 3 hours 15 minutes.
